original_text: Be it known unto the king, that we went into the province of Judea, to the house of the great God, which is builded with great stones, and timber is laid in the walls, and this work goeth fast on, and prospereth in their hands.
korean_text: 왕께 아뢰옵나이다 우리가 유다 도에 가서 지극히 크신 하나님의 성전에 나아가 본즉 성전을 큰 돌로 세우며 벽에 나무를 얹고 부지런히 일하므로 공사가 그 손에서 형통하옵기에

sentences.original_text: Be it known unto the king
that we went into the province of Judea
to the house of the great God
which is builded with great stones
and timber is laid in the walls
and this work goeth fast on
